title: 求翔麟多人多模组生存整合【高悬赏】
author: 胡胡自制
txt_content:
最近看了翔麟的多人多模组视频，感觉这些MOD都不错，但是他没发整合，MOD太多本人整合不过来，在这里求大神帮忙整合一下，MOD如下：                            AbyssalCraft
Animated Player
Archimedes Ships
AttachableGrinder 
BiblioCraft
BiomesOPlenty
Buildcraft
Carpenter's Blocks
CandyCraft 
Craft Guide
DamageIndicators
Death Counter
DecoCraft
Electrical Age
FloatingRuins
Food Plus
Fossils Archeology Revival
Inventory Tweaks
Minecraft Comes Alive
Morph
MrCrayfishFurniture
MutantCreatures
MystCraft
OptiFine
ProjectZulu
SecretRooms
ShadersModCore
Treecapitator
TooManyItems
TwilightForest
VoxelMap
WildyCraft
Witchery
[fly]MOD太多我出血本来收了{:10_505:}[/fly]
[fly]再次跪求[/fly]

replies.txt_content:

http://pan.baidu.com/s/1bno2Gub 把mods文件夹解压出来放进有forge的.minecraft文件夹里面

replies.txt_content: 有大神会整合吗。会的喵一声~o( =∩ω∩= )m
